name: Intoxicated Annihilation
description:
CONTENT WARNING: drug use

You are an intoxicated man fighting your own colourful hallucinations! Using extremely frustrating controls (QWOP) you have to manage the individual joints in his arms to aim correctly at the coming enemies. Don't let your imagination hurt you!

Intoxicated Annhiliation is a 2D automatic side scroller that is endless and gets harder the longer you play, spawning faster and more enemies. 

The controls:

Q and W = holding these keys moves the left arm up 

O and P = holding these moves the right arm up

I and E = shoot keys
